description: After an easy pasta recipe? Try this super speedy baked feta pasta. Simply bake tomatoes and feta together for a quick, no-fuss homemade pasta sauce.
keywords: Pasta,Pescatarian,Nicky,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Video,Low sugar,Sesame free,Quick & easy,Halal,High protein,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Baked Feta Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place tomatoes on a large, shallow baking tray. Place feta in centre of tray. Drizzle with oil, then sprinkle with oregano and season. Bake for 30 minutes or until feta starts to brown.
Meanwhile, cook pasta according to packet instructions.
Remove tray from oven. Using a fork, crush feta and tomatoes. Add drained pasta to tray and toss to combine. Scatter over basil leaves and serve.
